title: 紧急问题沟通
situation: There's a production bug. Users can't log in. You need to coordinate a quick response.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 线上出bug了，用户登录不了。
turns.pinyin: Xiànshàng chū bug le, yònghù dēnglù bù liǎo.
turns.translation: There's a bug in production, users can't log in.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我先拉个会，大家十分钟后上线。
turns.pinyin: Wǒ xiān lā ge huì, dàjiā shí fēnzhōng hòu shàngxiàn.
turns.translation: Let me set up a quick call, everyone join in ten minutes.
suggestions: 我先拉个会，大家十分钟后上线。
马上拉会，十分钟后一起排查。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 后端说是我们前端的问题。
turns.pinyin: Hòu duān shuō shì wǒmen qiánduān de wèntí.
turns.translation: Backend says it's a frontend issue.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我们先一起看日志，确定根因再分工。
turns.pinyin: Wǒmen xiān yīqǐ kàn rìzhì, quèdìng gēnyīn zài fēngōng.
turns.translation: Let's look at the logs together first, identify root cause, then divide the work.
suggestions: 我们先一起看日志，确定根因再分工。
先查日志定位问题，再分头修。
